name: reapReapReap1
description: Reap, reap, reap!

name: reapReapReap2
description: I am the Reaper of Souls! ... Wait, that was quite obvious...

name: reapReapReap3
description: Don't you just love reaping souls! Mwahaha!

name: reapFlameBee1
description: My sisters are making fun of me. Can you reap their soul?

name: reapFlameBee2
description: I think my sister ordered you to kill me. Can you kill her instead... And my other 99 sisters?

name: reapFlameBee3
description: Damn, I'm starting to really enjoy this! Let's reap MOAR Flame Bee souls! Mwahaha!

name: reapVolcadillo1
description: 'Sup Reap! It's me, Ryder. I'm lookin' for Volcadillo shells y'know! Reap'em Volcadillos and gimme the shells will ya?

name: reapVolcadillo2
description: Sup Reap! It's me again. Turns out 10 weren't 'nough. Would'ya mind bringin' me, like, 100? Thanks bro!

name: reapVolcadillo3
description: Sup Reap! So hum... how about 1000...? Ya?

name: reapWindyFish1
description: Stupid Windy Fish is being a bully with their lightning and all. Please reap their soul for me.

name: reapWindyFish2
description: You are pro! Now rid my whole town of Windy Fish!

name: reapWindyFish3
description: What a bloodbath! How about exterminating the whole species now, Mister Reaper?

name: reapStabbySquirrel1
description: I hate squirrels. Especially those who stab. Stab'em for me will ya?

name: reapStabbySquirrel2
description: Our kind is being slaughtered. That's so much fun. Let's all join in on the fun!

name: reapStabbySquirrel3
description: Those squirrels are mad asking to kill their own kind! Let's oblige! KILL MWOAR SQUIRRELS!

name: reapCursedSnake1
description: Sup Reap! Have I ever told'ya I hate snakes? Get rid'a some for me will ya?

name: reapCursedSnake2
description: Sup Reap! I should'a been more explicit. Reap 100 Cursed Snake souls!

name: reapCursedSnake3
description: Sup Reap! Oops. I meant 1000 of 'em! Go get'em tiger!

name: reapOctoblader1
description: I hate stick webs. Let's exterminate those Spider Man wannabees shall we?

name: reapOctoblader2
description: Dammit! Now I've got sticky webs all over me! Burn all the webz!

name: reapOctoblader3
description: I heard there's only 900 more of these Octobladers in this realm. Let's just kill them all!

name: reapBurningWorm1
description: Look, I've got an easy task for you: get rid of those pesky worms out there!

name: reapBurningWorm2
description: Figured out how to defeat Burning Worms? That's right! With my help! Now let's kill more!

name: reapBurningWorm3
description: Drown those pests now!

name: reapBurningDrake1
description: Dragons! Badass. Let's hunt them!

name: reapBurningDrake2
description: I shall be know as the best dragon hunter ever!

name: reapBurningDrake3
description: Bring them to extinction!

name: reapSaintSquirrel1
description: Kill the healer!

name: reapSaintSquirrel2
description: Healing is for losers.

name: reapSaintSquirrel3
description: I don't like white squirrels!

name: reapShieldTurtle1
description: You are not getting through us!

name: reapShieldTurtle2
description: Damn, I guess you are...

name: reapShieldTurtle3
description: Stop it, it hurts!

name: reapFlamingWall1
description: Bite the walls, they're in the way!

name: reapFlamingWall2
description: We are the blockers. Eliminate the imposters.

name: reapFlamingWall3
description: BREAK DOWN ALL THE WALLS!!!

name: collectLoot1
description: I feel underdressed. Let's get myself some loot!

name: collectLoot2
description: My loot is trash. Let's get more better loot!

name: collectLoot3
description: GIMME ALL THE LOOT!

name: collectWeaponLoot1
description: Who doesn't like a good scythe? I think would make a nice collection!

name: collectWeaponLoot2
description: I can't believe I thought 10 scythes would make a collection... 100 is a good collection!

name: collectWeaponLoot3
description: Fuse these pieces of shit! I need a thousand more weapons!

name: collectArmorLoot1
description: I guess I need some protection for those bones of mine...

name: collectArmorLoot2
description: Robes, robes, more robes! 'da fuck kinda protection is that? Find more better armor!

name: collectHeadLoot1
description: Having just a skull is cold. Freezing really. Let's find some headwear!

name: collectHeadLoot2
description: A tuque, a tuque, a tuque! I want a tuque. How badass is a grim reaper with a tuque!

name: collectHeadLoot3
description: Now I've got some many I could start a Shopify store. How about http://reapertuques.shop?

name: collectArmorLoot3
description: I say more BETTER ARMOR! Not another feaking robe!

name: collectCommonLoot1
description: I'm looking for material for fusing. Let's get some trash loot shall we?

name: collectCommonLoot2
description: Why did I think 10 would be enough. Get 10x more!

name: collectCommonLoot3
description: Someone's giving me legendary loot for collecting 1000 common loot. Let's get to it!

name: combatBuff1
description: Burn'em all! For their protection of course!

name: combatBuff2
description: Guard'em all! Such is the way of the Tank.

name: combatBuff3
description: Quickly, let's take'em out!

name: damageFire1
description: Have you used me in combat yet? Now's the time!

name: damageFire2
description: Burn everything!

name: damageFire3
description: GOTTA TORCH'EM ALL!

name: trainBubblyFang1
displayName: Train against squad Bubbly Fang x1
description: Seafood for dinner!

name: trainBubblyFang2
displayName: Train against squad Bubbly Fang x10
description: Well, I'm still hungry. Let's hunt more!

name: trainBubblyFang3
displayName: Train against squad Bubbly Fang x100
description: Let's just empty the ocean now, shall we?

name: trainBeeDillo1
description: I heard a Flame Bee squaded up with a Volcadillo to create squad BeeDillo. Mwahaha, such ridiculous name! BeeGone BeeDillo!

name: trainBeeDillo2
description: I never tire of reaping squad BeeDillo! Such a dumb squad!

name: trainBeeDillo3
description: I NEVER tire of reaping squad BeeDillo! Mwahaha! Ok no, it's starting to be pretty boring...

name: trainBurningIce1
displayName: Train against squad Burning Ice x1
description: That's a strange squad they formed there. Let's kill them for fun.

name: trainBurningIce2
displayName: Train against squad Burning Ice x10
description: Wait what? They're still alive? Let's beat them up again!

name: trainBurningIce3
displayName: Train against squad Burning Ice x100
description: Persistent fools! Let's crush them once and for all!

name: trainQuickPoison1
description: Can't let the poison spread! My bones aren't immune to poison after all!

name: trainQuickPoison2
description: Mwahaha! Mwahaha! Mwahaha! Damn, I think the poison's getting to my head. Let's get rid of some more of them.

name: trainQuickPoison3
description: Now I'm fed up of being stabbed, poisoned and electrocuted. I BRING REVENGE!

name: trainPiercingCannon1
displayName: Train against squad Piercing Cannon x1

name: trainPiercingCannon2
displayName: Train against squad Piercing Cannon x10

name: trainPiercingCannon3
displayName: Train against squad Piercing Cannon x100

name: trainBlazingLegs1
displayName: Train against squad Blazing Legs x1
description: Whooow, I like legs!

name: trainBlazingLegs2
displayName: Train against squad Blazing Legs x10
description: Actually, that's too much legs for me...

name: trainBlazingLegs3
displayName: Train against squad Blazing Legs x100
description: LET'S CHOP ALL THE LEGS! MWHAHA!

name: trainDragonForce1
displayName: Train against squad Dragon Force x1
description: Wah, a freaking dragon...? Actually, I'm not scared at all. Reap its soul now! Mwahaha!

name: trainDragonForce2
displayName: Train against squad Dragon Force x10
description: Ah! I knew I was more badass than dragons. Let's kill more. It's fun! Mwahaha!

name: trainDragonForce3
displayName: Train against squad Dragon Force x100
description: Nothing personal Draggy, but I really like feeding on your soul! You don't mind if I call you Draggy right? Mwahaha!

name: trainHolySquirellity1
displayName: Train against squad Holy Squirrelity x1
description: Holy Squirrelity? Mwahaha! Sounds like a low budget sect's name!

name: trainHolySquirellity2
displayName: Train against squad Holy Squirrelity x10
description: It is a sect, isn't it? Let me join, let me join! I'm a holy creature I promise!

name: trainHolySquirellity3
displayName: Train against squad Holy Squirrelity x100
description: You know what? I'm not cut out for saintly shit. Let's just reap all your souls! Mwahaha!

name: trainCursedGuard1
displayName: Train against squad Cursed Guard x1
description: I'm cursed too! Maybe we should join forces?

name: trainCursedGuard2
displayName: Train against squad Cursed Guard x10
description: We're having so much fun together. We cursed creatures get each other right? Right? Wait you're dead? Ah right! I killed you! Mwahaha!

name: trainCursedGuard3
displayName: Train against squad Cursed Guard x100
description: Would you mind getting rid of your guards so I kill more of you? You wouldn't mind right (such a dumbass!)?

name: trainBurnMFBurn1
displayName: Train against squad Burn MF Burn x1
description: I have a feeling fire protection might come in handy here...

name: trainBurnMFBurn2
displayName: Train against squad Burn MF Burn x10
description: I was right. As always. Unrelated: nice place to reap Flame Bee Souls! Mwahaha!

name: trainBurnMFBurn3
displayName: Train against squad Burn MF Burn x100
description: REAP ALL THE FLAME BEE SOULS! MWHAHAHA!

displayName: Train against squad Rodent In Flames x1

name: trainRodentInFlames2
displayName: Train against squad Rodent In Flames x10

name: trainRodentInFlames3
displayName: Train against squad Rodent In Flames x100
